name: MythStarter
blurb: We are The Team of Dedicated Myth Developers Hell Bent on Bringing it Back!  We have over 3 decades combined spent working on Myth.

rewards.reward: "Thrall" Tier - In numbers we are strong! Any and every backer is equally valued, and to show our gratitude for any and all people who love Myth, want to see it come back, or just want to see this crazy game we're showing you succeed, everyone who backs us for any amount will get to have [their name in the game credits]! For 10 dollars you will get the [Digital Download] of the game, [Reserve] your own custom login/username for use on carnage.net. You also receive the [Digital Art Book], the [Musical Score] and the [Digital Stat Book!] Plus, when you log into multiplayer you get the exclusive ["Backer" icon] which only is given to those who helped the initial kickstarter push for Myth's revival!

"Warrior" Tier - A single man in armor is a warrior. But get a couple thousand warriors together and what do you have? An ARMY! You get to [add your name to the list of randomly chosen names for warriors]! And you don't have to put your actual name, you can always choose to give us your online moniker or just a name you made up that you think is cool! Whatever it is, it'll make it into the final game as an actual unit name! Every backer is assured a [Digital Download] of the game upon release, but those in the warrior tier get to wear the exclusive [Founder icon] in multiplayer (supercedes "Backer" icon)! And of course  [reserve] your login/username, receive the [Digital Art Book], the [Musical Score] and the [Digital Stat Book]!

"Journeyman" Tier - At this tier, you get to add your uniqueness or flare to the game itself! [Create your own multiplayer icon] - we send you a 150x150 template, you send us back your icon! There are a few guidelines, but we have a sense of humor and will be considering icons on a case-by-case basis. Once approved it will be added to the list of choosable icons in the final game. Includes all previous rewards, plus the rare ["MYTHIC" icon], which supercedes the "Founder" icon.

"Berserk" Tier - Amazingly [Epic Poster]! Satisfy your bloodlust with a large-scale battle scene filled with carnage to hang on your wall! Amaze your friends at the sheer scale of battles possible in a modern Myth game! You also get the Special ["LEGENDARY" icon] in multiplayer. Plus all previous rewards.

"Warlock" Tier - Get a [t-shirt] and a [signed version of the Epic Poster]! Members of the team sign the battle scene poster for you, so you can have a piece of Myth veritae of your very own! Includes all previous rewards.

"Surly Dwarf" Tier - At this tier, you get the snazzy [Satchel Charge Throw Pillow]! Dream yourself into oblivion by resting your noggin on pounds of fantasy high-explosives! Includes all previous rewards! You get the [signed Epic Poster] from the previous tier of course, and also [your name in the SPECIAL THANKS] category of the credits for your generous contribution to myth's revival!

"Trow" Tier - In this tier you get a [3d map] - that's right, a section from an actual level in the game as a 3d scene! At this tier and up, you get to have [your name on a grave headstone] somewhere in the final game's levels! There will be graves aplenty on single and multiplayer maps, so you might end up on a neat, atmospheric spot in a cool level! Also, receive a [Physical Copy of the Unit Statistics Book]! See the vitality, movement speed, attack rate, damage, weaknesses, resistances, and more for every single character included in the game release! Know the units in and out, and discover your best strategies. Sweet!

"Shade" Tier - [Have your name on a shrine]. Be a part of Myth lore! Each person who backs on this tier gets their name inscribed on a unique, one-of-a-kind shrine somewhere in the game for all to see! Not one shrine with a bunch of names, but many shrines and each one different and dedicated to just YOU! Includes.  At this esteemed level of support, get access to our Development Teamspeak3 VOIP server and be part of production meetings and be privy to all kinds of behind the scenes happenings.  Includes all previous rewards.

"Avatara" Tier -  [Create your own artifact] that will appear in the actual campaign or multiplayer level! Send us your idea, and reference imagery (it could even be a photo of something you own!) Work with us to create a backstory and a balanced (but fun) gameplay change based on it!  Includes all previous rewards

"Fallen Lord" Tier- Receive a [custom 6-inch statuette of your favorite Myth character]! Choose your favorite unit from the series and we'll send you a 3d masterpiece to put on your mantle or chill on your desk! Includes all previous rewards

"Hero" Tier -  At this level, you get to work with our team to [design a level] that will be in the final game! We'll show you that all you need is an idea, and we can show you personally  how fun the creative process for this game really is! There will be guidelines, but it's the kind of process that has to happen in person and organically (and it should be a lot of fun for us too! It's no chore to create something awesome!). Includes all previous rewards.

$10,000 "Leveller" - Be a force of significant contribution to the project! [Work with the team to design an actual character in the game]! This could be an original character you've designed already or you could tell us exactly what you want and we'll make it in front of you at the studio! Will he be evil, or good? Warrior, villager, monster or necromancer? Is he a hero unit (only one in the game) or do you want to make a WHOLE NEW enemy type that the player will have to fight against on various level and as a tradeable unit in multiplayer battles? It's up to you! There will be some guidelines that are better discussed in person once you have a solid idea, but we are pretty flexible at this high of a reward level! a VIP pass to the studios, get co-producer credit, and ALL previous reward tiers, but you'll be called upon to help make the character and hang out before the game ships, so you get part of your reward earlier than everyone else!
